sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import swal from "sweetalert"; import swalMessage from "@sweetalert/with-react"; import PageTitle from "../../../layouts/PageTitle"; const MainSweetAlert = () => { return (

Sweet Wrong

Sweet Message

Sweet Text

Sweet Success

Sweet Confirm

Sweet Confirm Or Cancel

Sweet Image Message

Sweet HTML

Sweet Auto Close

Sweet Prompt

Sweet Ajax

 ); }; export default MainSweetAlert;
